summary: hi! could you do a Valentine's scenario where bakugou wants to confess to the reader but chickens out last minute and is like...
question: hi! could you do a Valentine's scenario where bakugou wants to confess to the reader but chickens out last minute and is like "i-i don't hate you!" and the reader knows what he means and teases him? thank you!!!!💛💛💛💛
answer:
pairing: katsuki bakugou x reader

warnings: none

a/n: no problem! happy early valentine’s day hehe

—-

He was going to tell you, he really was.

Bakugou had orchestrated everything meticulously, to what kind of chocolates he would give you, to the exact praises and compliments he would shower you in before he confessed.

But as soon as Bakugou saw you, his perfectly crafted plan disappeared from his mind. You just looked so beautiful, and Bakugou couldn’t seem to focus on anything but you.

“Hey, Bakugou!” You called out cheerily, breaking away from the chattering group of girls surrounding you. “The fireworks are about to start y’know, we have to get good seats!” Your fingers interlaced with his, tugging him over to a large clearing.

Bakugou didn’t budge, ripping his hand out of your grip.

“Tch, I can find a seat on my own.” He growled, turning away before you could see the faint red tint staining his cheeks.

As he stomped away, Bakugou internally chastised himself for his curt actions. He was trying to tell you that he liked you, not that he couldn’t stand being around you!

Kirishima’s dopey grin broke him out of his daze, teeth glimmering in the low light.

“Bro, it’s time to watch the fireworks! C’mon!” Kirishima said, warm hands clapping him on the back.

Bakugou grumbled in protest, but ended up following him. The clearing was almost entirely filled up, packed to the brim with eager students. Kirishima carefully maneuvered around the crowd, coming to stop when he saw the remainder of their classmates. Kirishima excitedly greeted all of them, but Bakugou was only searching for one face in particular.

Yours.

He caught sight of your familiar figure, and he unceremoniously pushed his way towards you. You jumped when he plopped down next to you, a small gasp escaping your lips.

“Oh! Hello!” You said, a smile returning to your face.

“Hey.”

You opened your mouth to say something, but the loud popping noises from above stopped you in your tracks. You squealed giddily, face now tipped to the sparkling display above you.

Bakugou hardly noticed the fireworks, too focused on your profile to care. The tingly feeling of your elbow brushing his made it that much harder for him to think, and Bakugou knew he was a goner when all he could smell was the honeyed scent of your perfume.

Bakugou was panicking. How could he tell you how he felt without seeming like a bumbling idiot? It all seemed futile now. He watched your tongue run over your bottom lip, and Bakugou instinctively did the same, wondering if you were tasting sugar.

As absorbed as you were in the glimmering flashes of colors that danced across the sky, you weren’t so oblivious that you couldn’t feel Bakugou’s heated stare.

“You’re staring.” You giggled, turning around to find him only inches away from your lips. The blue and red hues brightened his features, and you felt your heart stop.

“I-I don’t hate you, okay?” He mumbled, a serious expression painted on his features.  

“I know, Bakugou. I know.”

warnings: none

title: BNHA Angst Week Day 4
body:
@bnha-angst-week

Day 4: Choice // Wish

Link on Ao3

Rating: T

Relationships: Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead & Shinsou Hitoshi

Characters: Shinsou Hitoshi, Aizawa Shouta, Midoriya Izuku

Warnings: Serious Injury, Permanent Injury, Depressed State, Car Accidents, Drunk Driving, Minor Manga Spoilers, Short Fic

Summary: Shinsou Hitoshi had a real chance of getting into the hero course like he had wanted. But that chance was ripped from him before he could even reach his starting line.

Needed something shorter and calmer for day 4 after my mess of a day 3. Also please don’t kill me for the thing at the end of the fic. 

Bonus under the cut:

title: BNHA Angst Week Day 3
body:
@bnha-angst-week​

Day 3: Empty // Scar

Link on Ao3

Rating: M

Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki & Kirishima Eijirou, Bakugou Katsuki & Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki & Ashido Mina, Kirishima Eijirou & Ashido Mina

Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku, Ashido Mina

Warnings: Bakugou Swears a Lot, Bullying, Heavy Mentions of Suicide, Suicide Baiting, Self-Harm, Depression, Panic Attacks, Toxic Self-Esteem Issues, Mild Manga Spoilers

Summary: When Kirishima suddenly turns his back on Katsuki because of something he had said to Deku back in middle school, Katsuki’s anger gets the better of him and everything between them falls apart. After Ashido reveals things about Kirishima’s past, however, Katsuki decides to suck it up and apologise, but ends up walking into a scene that would probably haunt him for the rest of his life. And then, as cruel fate would have it, the only one who could help him through it was fucking Deku.

***IMPORTANT: This fic would probably initially come off as Bakugou bashing, and it was written to be very intense, but if you’re alright with it, please give it a chance and read it until the end. Thank you.

Easily one of the most intense things I’ve written, so please bear the tags in mind before reading. Originally this was meant to be KiriBaku, but as I wrote this I could not bring myself to put them into a relationship just yet. Feel free to consider this a pre-relationship piece though. Might write a follow-up after Angst Week is over.

reblog.comment:
@bnha-angst-week​

Warnings: Bakugou Swears a Lot, Bullying, Heavy Mentions of Suicide, Suicide Baiting, Self-Harm, Depression, Panic Attacks, Toxic Self-Esteem Issues, Mild Manga Spoilers

Summary: When Kirishima suddenly turns his back on Katsuki because of something he had said to Deku back in middle school, Katsuki’s anger gets the better of him and everything between them falls apart. After Ashido reveals things about Kirishima’s past, however, Katsuki decides to suck it up and apologise, but ends up walking into a scene that would probably haunt him for the rest of his life. And then, as cruel fate would have it, the only one who could help him through it was fucking Deku.

***IMPORTANT: This fic would probably initially come off as Bakugou bashing, and it was written to be very intense, but if you’re alright with it, please give it a chance and read it until the end. Thank you.

Easily one of the most intense things I’ve written, so please bear the tags in mind before reading. Originally this was meant to be KiriBaku, but as I wrote this I could not bring myself to put them into a relationship just yet. Feel free to consider this a pre-relationship piece though. Might write a follow-up after Angst Week is over.
